references.paper_title: Neural Jacobian Fields: Learning Intrinsic Mappings of Arbitrary Meshes
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Jacobian Fields, a novel representation for mesh deformation that is crucial to the core method of the current paper.

references.paper_title: SMPL: A skinned multi-person linear model

references.paper_title: Unsupervised shape and pose disentanglement for 3d meshes
